00019 #ifndef SP_MULTI_TEXTURED_GRID_H
00020 #define SP_MULTI_TEXTURED_GRID_H
00021 
00022 #include "SpGlHeaders.h"
00023 #include "SpStreamGeometry.h"
00024 
00025 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027 namespace Spark
00028 {
00029 
00030 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 class SpMultiTexturedGridSg : public SpStreamGeometry
00034 {
00035 
00037 public:
00038 
00039     inline SpMultiTexturedGridSg(
00040         int iRows = 1, int iCols = 1,
00041         float fMinX = 0.0f, float fMinY = 0.0f,
00042         float fMaxX = 1.0f, float fMaxY = 1.0f, float fZ=0.0f,
00043         float fMinS = 0.0f, float fMinT = 0.0f,
00044         float fMaxS = 1.0f, float fMaxT = 1.0f)
00045     :
00046         m_iRows(iRows), m_iCols(iCols),
00047         m_fMinX(fMinX), m_fMinY(fMinY),
00048         m_fMaxX(fMaxX), m_fMaxY(fMaxY), m_fZ(fZ)
00049     {
00050         glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_TEXTURE_UNITS, &m_iTextureUnitCount);
00051 
00052         m_afMinS = new float[m_iTextureUnitCount];
00053         m_afMaxS = new float[m_iTextureUnitCount];
00054         m_afMinT = new float[m_iTextureUnitCount];
00055         m_afMaxT = new float[m_iTextureUnitCount];
00056 
00057         setTexCoordRect(fMinS, fMinT, fMaxS, fMaxT);
00058     }
00059 
00060     inline virtual ~SpMultiTexturedGridSg()
00061     {
00062         delete [] m_afMinS;
00063         delete [] m_afMaxS;
00064         delete [] m_afMinT;
00065         delete [] m_afMaxT;
00066     }
00067 
00069 public:
00070 
00071     virtual void render()
00072     {
00073 
00074         float fWidth = m_fMaxX - m_fMinX;
00075         float fHeight = m_fMaxY - m_fMinY;
00076 
00077         float fCenterX = (fWidth / 2.0f) + m_fMinX;
00078         float fCenterY = (fHeight / 2.0f) + m_fMinX;
00079 
00080         float fDeltaS = m_afMaxS[0] - m_afMinS[0];
00081         float fDeltaT = m_afMaxT[0] - m_afMinT[0];
00082 
00083         float fCenterS = (fDeltaS / 2.0f) + m_afMinS[0];
00084         float fCenterT = (fDeltaT / 2.0f) + m_afMinT[0];
00085 
00086         float fDS = fDeltaS / m_iCols;
00087         float fDT = fDeltaT / m_iRows;
00088 
00089         float fDW = fWidth / m_iCols;
00090         float fDH = fHeight / m_iRows;
00091 
00092         // just use a single normal direction
00093         // for the entire grid
00094         glNormal3f(fCenterX, fCenterY, 1.0);
00095 
00096         float fS = m_afMinS[0];
00097         float fT = m_afMinT[0];
00098         int i = 0;
00099 
00100         for (float fY = m_fMinY; fY < m_fMaxY; fY += fDH)
00101         {
00102             glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
00103             fS = m_afMinS[0];
00104             for (float fX = m_fMinX; fX < m_fMaxX; fX += fDW)
00105             {
00106                 for (i = 0; i < m_iTextureUnitCount; ++i)
00107                     glMultiTexCoord2f(GL_TEXTURE0 + i, fS, fT);
00108                 glVertex3f(fX, fY, m_fZ);
00109 
00110                 for (i = 0; i < m_iTextureUnitCount; ++i)
00111                     glMultiTexCoord2f(GL_TEXTURE0 + i, fS, fT + fDT);
00112                 glVertex3f(fX, fY + fDH, m_fZ);
00113 
00114                 fS += fDS;
00115             }
00116             fT += fDT;
00117             glEnd();
00118         }
00119     }
00120 
00121     inline void setResolution(
00122         int iRows, int iCols)
00123     {
00124         m_iRows = iRows;
00125         m_iCols = iCols;
00126     }
00127 
00128     inline void setTexCoordRect(
00129         float fMinS, float fMinT, float fMaxS, float fMaxT)
00130     {
00131         for (int i = 0; i < m_iTextureUnitCount; ++i)
00132         {
00133             setSingleTexCoordRect(i, fMinS, fMinT, fMaxS, fMaxT);
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     inline void setVertexCoordRect(
00138         float fMinX, float fMinY, float fMaxX, float fMaxY, float fZ=0.5f)
00139     {
00140         m_fMinX = fMinX; m_fMaxX = fMaxX;
00141         m_fMinY = fMinY; m_fMaxY = fMaxY;
00142         m_fZ = fZ;
00143     }
00144 
00145 
00147 protected:
00148 
00149     inline void setSingleTexCoordRect(
00150         int iTexUnit, float fMinS, float fMinT, float fMaxS, float fMaxT)
00151     {
00152         m_afMinS[iTexUnit] = fMinS; m_afMaxS[iTexUnit] = fMaxS;
00153         m_afMinT[iTexUnit] = fMinT; m_afMaxT[iTexUnit] = fMaxT;
00154     }
00155 
00156 
00158 protected:
00159 
00160     int m_iTextureUnitCount;
00161 
00162     int m_iRows;
00163     int m_iCols;
00164 
00165     float m_fMinX;
00166     float m_fMinY;
00167     float m_fMaxX;
00168     float m_fMaxY;
00169 
00170     float m_fZ;
00171 
00172     float *m_afMinS;
00173     float *m_afMaxS;
00174     float *m_afMinT;
00175     float *m_afMaxT;
00176 };
00177 
00178 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00179 
00180 } // end namespace: Spark
00181 
00182 #endif
